divs: sighting detailsaway from home, awoke from sleep and began to stare at a clear bright northern night sky looking over the gulf of mexico from the window of a beach house on stilts-a tiny star like object possibly satellite or plane appeared to be making an orbit-it stopped and began to go back and forth-up and down-no pattern-awoke person sleeping with me-as we watched it drop in the sky it changed to a huge saucer like object directly in front of the window-couldnt determined size-300 ft might be close-football field in length-hard to tell-we both were able to describe what we saw to reinforce our sighting-pleading to let us board-four windows on the underside facing us-2\3 of bottom a round bright light that appeared to be the power source-it moved slowly up in the sky-we ran outside and got under the object pleading to let us board-it made another ascension into the sky and from stand-still it zoomed with no sound to the southeast and eventually out of sight. we were very excited and telling the experience always comes with a letdown due to disbelief. we have no missing time but alot of facts came to mind that i had never considered-strange things about how we evolved and how we connect to them-they were from orion-pelates-siris connected-i do not have recall what they might have looked like-why would we think these things without boarding-we never talked about missing time because it didnt seem to matter the strangest thing about this for us is the fact that they knew i was watching the sky-made the fact know from a distance and come close for observation. the person that had this encounter with me is dead but it was a habit to call each other just to go over the facts again and consider how fortunate we were for the experience.
